sentences.en: Conlon also sees great potential for other biotic gablications antibiotic applications.
sentences.cn: 同时,肯伦还看好其他抗生素的应用前景.

sentences.en: Consistency of biotic community and eco logicaI environment is a basic element of ecosystem.
sentences.cn: 生物群落与生态环境的统一性是生态系统的基本特征.

sentences.en: For biotic communities parallel terms: biocoenose and biocoenon may be used.
sentences.cn: 生物群落也可用相似的术语; 生物群落和生物群丛.

sentences.en: From our study, we verified that plants did not response to biotic and abiotic stress independently.
sentences.cn: 本研究证实了植物对生物与非生物的胁迫作出的响应并非相对独立的两个过程.

sentences.en: How is life limited by and adapted to extreme external biotic and abiotic factors?
sentences.cn: 限制的生命透过怎样并且适应极端外部生命和无生命的原素?

sentences.en: In plant cells, actin cytoskeleton plays important roles in response to biotic and abiotic stresses.
sentences.cn: 植物细胞对外界生物或非生物的胁迫做出反应时, 微丝骨架起了重要的作用.

sentences.en: Insects fed on a bland ( nontoxic ) diet would show their real biotic potential.
sentences.cn: 昆虫取食了味纯和的 ( 无毒的 ) 饲料可能表现出它们真正的生物潜能.

sentences.en: Many of the plant retrotransposons are transcriptionally activated by various biotic and abiotic stress factors.
sentences.cn: 在一些生物的和非生物的逆境条件下,反转录转座子的转录可以被激活.

sentences.en: Selenium is one of the most important metalloid element existing in biotic environment.
sentences.cn: 硒是生物环境中存在的一种重要的类金属元素.

sentences.en: Studying late Permian biotic events in this area will further the understanding of those events.
sentences.cn: 对此区域内二叠纪晚期生物灭绝事件的研究,有助于更全面的把握二叠纪末期生物灭绝事件在扬子区内的表现.

sentences.en: Tagatose, a natural low - calorie sweetener, has many physiological functions including - hyperglycemia - biotic effects and - cariogenicity.
sentences.cn: 塔格糖是一种天然的低能量填充型甜味剂, 并具有抑制高血糖、改善肠道菌群和不致龋齿等多种生理功效.

sentences.en: The actuator placement optimization of piezothermoelastic biotic thermal robust structure is studied in this paper.
sentences.cn: 研究热压电仿生热鲁棒结构中的致动器放置优化问题.

sentences.en: The researchers think that their biotic games could be educational to help people learn about biology, and they also think that such a forum could serve as a place to conduct real experiments.
sentences.cn: 研究人员认为他们的生物游戏有教育意义，可以帮助人们学习生物知识，他们还认为这样的论坛可以作为进行真实实验的场地。

words.tran_cn: 生物区（系）；一时代（一地区）的动植物
[生物] 生物技术；[生物] 生物工艺学
生物型；[遗] 同型小种

trans.tran_en: of or relating to living organisms
